name: navbar
title: Navbar
description: The navbar is a simple wrapper for positioning branding, navigation, and other elements into a concise navigation header.

options.name: fixed
options.description: Removes rounded corners and sticks the navbar to the top/bottom.

options.name: type
options.description: When type is set to dark, light font color will be applied.

options.name: full
options.description: Removes rounded corners if set to true.
